name: azure-auth
description: Microsoft Entra ID (Azure AD) authentication for React SPAs with MSAL.js and Cloudflare Workers backend JWT validation. Full-stack pattern: MSAL React for frontend auth flows, jose library for Workers token validation (MSAL.js doesnt work in Workers). CRITICAL: Azure AD JWKS endpoint is NOT at standard .well-known/jwks.json - must fetch from openid-configuration first. MSAL v3.0.23 + msal-browser v4.27.0 use Authorization Code Flow with PKCE (no implicit flow). Use when: implementing Microsoft/A
